text: The Rub' al Khali or Empty Quarter is a desert in Saudi Arabia. It is one of the largest sand deserts in the world. It covers an area of about 650,000 square kilometres, more than all of Holland, Belgium and France together. Some of the sand dunes are more than 250 metres high. == References == Category:Geography of Saudi Arabia Category:Deserts of Asia
title: Rub' al Khali
